data.title: Crypto-adjacent stocks rally as bitcoin and ethereum bounce
data.description: ** Shares of cryptocurrency and blockchain-related firms jump early Tues, as bitcoin and ethereum bounce back on Tues** Bitcoin, world's largest cryptocurrency, fell >5% on Mon and extended recent steep losses as investors shunned risk assets** Bitcoin BITSTAMP:BTCUSD up 4.9% at $90,658.57 on Tues…
